title: Beets & Berries
description: A 100% vegan/raw/organic smoothie and juice bar offers a variety of smoothies and cold-pressed juices with local fruits and veggies. Smoothies include lemon cheesecake, red velvet, chocolate spice and green heaven. Products include plant-based protein powders, four sigma mushroom blends, eat's what good salads and desserts, kombucha, food monkey salad dressings and sauces. Cleanse packages available.
